title: [Static Topic] Is it necessary to consider the compatible while upgrade namesrv and broker?
description:
We know that static topic introduced the logic queue and physic queue's mapping configs. And broker register itself would carry these configs. If we update the cluster by rolling_up, there would be 2 situations:

  1. Old version broker didn't carry topic queue mapping configs but the new version name server would try to decode these info, which would failed.
  2. New version broker would carry topic queue mapping configs but the old version name server couldn't decode the heart beat data.

    Should we consider these cases?
